mapper.select: SELECT sar.system_account_role_id, sar.system_account_id, sar.system_role_id FROM system_account_role sar WHERE sar.system_account_id = #{systemAccountId} AND created_at = ( SELECT ssar.created_at FROM system_account_role ssar WHERE ssar.system_account_id = #{systemAccountId} ORDER BY ssar.system_account_role_id DESC LIMIT 1 )
